app_description.message: Automatically shuffle through a folder of wallpapers!

app_slogan.message: A wallpaper manager for your Chromebook.

notification_update_message_v_1_3_0.message: For this update, all settings had to be reset. Click here to set them again manually. Sorry for the inconvenience.

info_skipped_files_plural.description: Inform the user about the number of skipped files.

placeholder_no_folder_specified.description: Shown when the folder path is empty

error_invalid_interval.message: Please enter a number between 1 and 99!
error_invalid_interval.description: Shown when an invalid number is entered into the interval field

tooltip_refresh_clicked.description: Tooltip for the refresh button when it's clicked

snackbar_no_folder_selected_message.description: Snackbar text if the user tries to do something where a folder is necessary.

snackbar_no_folder_selected_action.description: Snackbar action to choose a folder if none is selected.

icon_actionbar_1.description: Icon for the first button next to three-dots button (from the right)

icon_actionbar_2.description: Icon for the second button next to three-dots button (from the right)

wallpaper_location_headline.description: Headline for the general settings page

keyboard_shortcuts_headline.description: Headline for the keyboard shortcuts page

btn_choose_folder.description: Caption on the button to choose a folder

setting_title_timer.description: First settings item in the general settings

property_headline_1.description: Second settings item in the general settings

property_headline_2.description: Third settings item in the general settings

array_layout_mode.description: Array used to store layout options

array_delay_unit.description: Array used to store time interval units

prefix__android_media.description: Path prefix media files, if they're neither audio, images or videos.
